channel.title: Item Requirements?
channel.description:
I'm a newb coder so don't make fun of meh.
When I wield Dclaws they require 60 defence. I already searched for Dclaws Code, 8002, and didn't find anything relating to item requirements. I'm using 317 Delta. And don't post any comments saying Delta is shit. I like delta.

item.title: Item Requirements?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

um…I know in PI you would make a case for that item id and then a levelreq.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Requirements?
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

The skill ID for defence is 1. And I searched playerLevel[1] but nothing about dclaws came up.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Requirements?
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Im also somewhat of a “newb coder” so yea…
but i do know that it would be something like this:
(NOT EXACTLY JUST AN EXAMPLE)
DONT USE THIS ITS JUST AN EXAMPLE IT WILL BE DIFFERENT FOR YOU

If (Player.Wield("8802")) && Player.Skill[*read sidenote] ==>60 { Return; }else{ sM("Your Defence Skill Must be Above 60 to wield this item"); Player.Unwield.swordspot; } //EPIC FAIL but it gives you an idea //Someone refine this code ALOT..lol

*Sidenote:
This would be the skill Number
i dont know what it is, its like 4 er sumtin

Read full topic
